Course Name: ACG 3331 - COST ACCOUNING & ANALYSIS FOR BUSINESS DECISIONS
Course Title: COST ACCOUNING & ANALYSIS FOR BUSINESS DECISIONS
Prerequisites: PREREQUISITE: ACG 2071 WITH A GRADE OF "C" OR BETTER.
Course Description: STUDY OF TECHNIQUES OF COST ACCOUNTING AND COST ANALYSIS FOR VARIOUS BUSINESS DECISIONS. CREDIT NOT ALLOWED FOR ACCOUNTING MAJORS.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
